metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11979 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: As mitigation for CVE-2020-1945 Apache Ant 1.10.8 changed the permissions of temporary files it created so that only the current user was allowed to access them. Unfortunately the fixcrlf task deleted the temporary file and created a new one without said protection, effectively nullifying the effort. This would still allow an attacker to inject modified source files into the build process.

criterions.comment: ant: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
